title: Looking for Duo Support!
body: Bronze 1, looking for duo support to get into gold with. I was Silver 1 last season, but want to start having a duo to build synergy with! In game is Giggiley add me and tell me rank/style of play.

replies.body: Main supp lvl 30 g3 add me Brandonbdog00 love supporting people who know whats going on

Just finished placements and in B2 - was Silver last season. Looking for that gold. ^_^

Level 7 {{champion:16}} main. Playstyle is aggressive laning phase to spoonfeed my ADC that precious XP and gold.   Death is the best cc  >=)
oh boy im your guy, rank: b5 style of play: usually defensive, opting to farm closer to turret anticipating ganks and trying to mantain vision (unless malphite support, then {{summoner:6}} )

> [{quoted}](name=Silencega,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=Nyos6UZJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-12T06:42:07.093+0000)
>
> oh boy im your guy, rank: b5 style of play: usually defensive, opting to farm closer to turret anticipating ganks and trying to mantain vision (unless malphite support, then {{summoner:6}} )

Add me in game, Giggiley is the name
